alert.note: Alert for Delaware; Sullivan (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 12 at 4:14AM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Delaware, Sullivan, southeastern Wayne and Pike Counties through 500 AM EST... At 413 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Jefferson to near Skytop. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Rockland, Fallsburg, Bushkill, Monticello, Lackawaxen, Blooming Grove, Honesdale, Liberty, Bethel and Paupack. This includes the following highway exits... Interstate 86/Route 17 between 92 and 116. Interstate 84 between 20 and 53. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
